column5: Hi Folks,  I have some time off work, and have found that during the weekdays, I get bored easy. All my fishing friends are still at work.  If you want to go out fishing during the week day, please PM me. I live in Toronto by Yorkdale Mall, and fish regularly on Simcoe, Scugog and Rice. It will be cool to carpool and share the gas and parking.  If you are new to ice fishing, I have extra equipment. You just have to have a very warm pair of boots (-40C or warmer), and dress warm.  I am not a guide. I am just looking to fish with company (especially ice fishing. I don't want to be going out by myself.)  Sleepjigging
unreal offer to someone looking to try out ice fishing.  ive yet to have a bad experience meeting up with members from the forum in general if you like fishing, i probably like you and vice versa

Do you have a machine? I have every other tues/wed off and always go fishing. I take my gf and our sled, and never really know where we going....if you have a machine you are welcome to join us anytime.  S.
Thanks sinker. I am a walker. Have not sunken that much money into ice fishing yet.  Lol.
I have fished fished with  sleepjigging , good guy.
X 2 Had the pleasure to fish with him last weekend
